data.description: Tina Turner's youngest son Ronnie tragically passed away on Dec. 8 at the age of 62 and the cause has finally been revealed by the coroner's office as complications from colon cancer.

data.author: Australian Associated Press
data.description: Australia coach on holidays after run to last 16 in QatarFootball Australia will not go to market until talks with ArnoldSocceroos coach Graham Arnold appears set to be offered a fresh contract as informal negotiations continue with Football Australia hierarchy. Arnold’s previous deal expired after overseeing Australia’s most successful World Cup at the tournament in Qatar.The head coach is holidaying in the United Kingdom, with FA chief executive officer James Johnson keeping in contact ahead of Arnold’s return to Australia after Christmas. Johnson has pledged to not sound out any other...
data.title: Graham Arnold set for Socceroos contract offer after World Cup success

data.author: Australian Associated Press
data.description: ‘I can stick up for myself,’ says wife of opener David WarnerCandice Warner given phone number to call if abused againCandice Warner says Cricket Australia’s offer of extra security at Test matches is important for the safety of her three daughters and families of all players. Warner revealed on Monday she was abused by a member of the crowd in Adelaide last week while walking to meet her husband and Australian opener David in the players’ area.The incident prompted her to confront a group of men while she had two of her daughters, aged three and eight, with her. CA have since contacted...
data.title: Candice Warner eschews bodyguard offer for Test matches amid safety concerns

data.author: THE ASSOCIATED PRESS
data.description: DENVER  | An automatic recount confirmed Monday that Republican Rep. Lauren Boebert won her reelection bid against Democrat Adam Frisch. The nail-biter race showed the congresswoman’s combative style is wearying voters in her conservative Colorado district. Secretary of State Jena Griswold announced the results Monday evening. Frisch netted a total of four votes in the […]
data.title: Recount confirms Lauren Boebert narrowly held her House seat by 554 votes

data.author: Reuters
data.description: SINGAPORE, Dec 13 (Reuters) – Asian stock markets slipped after making early gains on Tuesday, as investors waited for U.S. inflation data that many hope will persuade the Federal Reserve and other central banks to step back from aggressive interest rate hikes. MSCI’s broadest index of Asia-Pacific shares outside Japan was up 0.10% in midday […]
data.title: Asian stocks waver ahead of U.S. inflation data and central bank rate decisions

data.author: Matthew Keys
data.description: Department store chain Kohl's had the most-run commercial spot on radio stations across the country, with over 40,000 spots aired. It was about 8,000 spots fewer than last week's king of commercials, insurance company Progressive.
data.title: Kohl’s Grabs Top Commercial Spot
